content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

```julia
function find(arr)
    arr = sort(arr)
    if length(arr) % 2 == 0
        return (arr[length(arr) // 2 - 1] + arr[length(arr) // 2]) / 2
    else
        return arr[length(arr) // 2]
    end
end
```
Example:
```julia
julia> find([3, 7, 8, 10, 12])
9.5
```
